com.atakmap.android.update

Class BundledProductProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.update.BaseProductProvider
      • com.atakmap.android.update.BundledProductProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductProviderManager.Provider

    public class BundledProductProvider
extends BaseProductProvider
    Provides products that are bundled within ATAK APK Repo index stored at: atak/support/apks/bundled/product.inf
